item.title: An Open (Love) Letter To My Next Work Partner
item.description: TL;DNR Transparency is paramount. Make sure there are stated objectives (even if they’re inaccurate), daily check-ins, and quarterly reviews. Flexibility empowers your people to do the best work they can. Have a bias against policies, rules, and meetings. Trust is your most powerful tool. Get a bunch of good people together, point them in a direction, and get out of the way. One of the myriad benefits of having spent so much time working as a contractor is the variety of cultures, work practices, and methodologies employed by various companies.
